text: John William Henry II (born September 13, 1949) is an American businessman. He is the owner of the Boston Red Sox and Roush Fenway Racing. He is also the owner of the association football team Liverpool F.C. of the Premier League. He is one of the 50 richest people in Boston. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from Illinois
title: John W. Henry
